apollo.viz¶

Additional vizualizations for matplotlib.

date_heatmap(series[, start, end, mean, …]) Plot a calendar heatmap given a datetime series.
date_heatmap_figure(series[, cmap, …]) Plot a calendar heatmap on a new figure.
